pages.text: Spices can be applied to stews and sautéed dishes when they are taken from pots or pans. Spices usually grant an effect lasting a short period to the food. A seasoned food will lose its effect from spices when cooked again. Spices are contained in spice jars (actually flower pots), and some of the them are produced by resting.
Garum is made from fish in dolia, providing Jump Boost.
Vinegar is made from berries or apple in dolia, providing Night Vision.

Defrutum cannot to produced solely, but it occurs in foods cooked with $(l:intro/lead_cookwares)lead cookwares$(/l), providing Hyperactive. This effect functions similarly with Strength, but will double the damage you take.
Asafœtida ultimately comes from $(l:intro/vege#silphium)silphia$(/l), providing Resistance.
